description: Mobile techniques used by Concipit1248, ATT&CK software S0426 v1.0
name: Concipit1248 (S0426)

techniques.comment: Concipit1248 requests permissions to use the device camera.[1]
Concipit1248 has been distributed through the App Store.[1]
Concipit1248 communicates with the C2 server using HTTP requests.[1]
